titleInfo.title: Influence of fluoro atoms on the spontaneous and collision-induced fragmentation of the ions [M - OCH 3] + and [M + NH 4] + of per-0-acetylated methyl x-deoxy-x-fluoro-[alpha]-D- glucopyranosides

Grützmacher, “Influence of fluoro atoms on the spontaneous and collision-induced fragmentation of the ions [M - OCH 3] + and [M + NH 4] + of per-0-acetylated methyl x-deoxy-x-fluoro-[alpha]-D- glucopyranosides”, Organic Mass Spectrometry, vol. 26, 1991, pp. 171-172.
